wrote:

> Hello Sourabh,
>
> I wanted to check in regarding your support ticket 00422452. We haven’t
> heard from you in a while, and I just wanted to see if you still need
> assistance with this issue.
>
> If you’re still experiencing problems or have any updates to share, please
> let me know. If the issue has been resolved, I can go ahead and close the
> ticket on my end.
>
> Please feel free to reply to this email with any updates or questions.
> We’re here to help you get the most out of your Netwrix products.
>
> *Ticket Number:* 00422452
> *Ticket Subject:* Need support for SSO Integration
> *Ticket Details:* We are currently facing an issue in Endpoint
> Protector's SSO integration with Okta. We tried to change the nginx
> configuration to open another port to access the dashboard but it affected
> the SSO integration. We also want to open another port to get HTTPS access
> to the dashboard.
>
> Thank you!
>
